descriptions.description: Finance Management app, featuring transaction categorization and tallying.

descriptions.title: Farm Fight
descriptions.description: 1v1 your friend and race to completely infect the other's farm whilst caring for your own.

descriptions.title: Sims4 Pregnancy Mod
descriptions.description: My first game mod. Pregnancy mod to allow sims to repopulate in sims4. May be rendered non-functional, or obselete, depending on game updates.
